name: 7DRL - 2020
description:
Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, space to wait a turn.  ESC for menu.  Mousewheel zooms in and out.

Avoid enemies, reach the exit! Your system integrity degrades by one point every step you take - collect data files to maintain it. Gather funds in your journey to spend at the shops that occasionally appear, which will boost your integrity further.

This is an entry for the 2020 7 Day Roguelike game jam.  It's my first attempt at any form of roguelike - or, indeed, any form of turn-based game - and while it's certainly not what I had hoped to build during these seven days I'm glad that I was able to produce something that is playable, however briefly!
